# Syllable file for SylWord, Welsh
#
# FORMAT
# -------
# * Lines beginning with # are ignored, as are blank lines
# * Lines containing whitespace-separated character groups are used
#   as sets of syllable tokens
# * Each line overrides those above, on a first-found order
#   this means it's wise to put triphthongs first, then dipthongs, etc
# * Use UTF-8 encoding.


# triphthongs
iae iai iau iaw iei ieu iew ioe wae wai wau waw wei weu wew wiw wyw

# diphthongs
ae ai au aw ei eu ew ey iw oe oi ow uw wy yw ia ie io iy wa we wi wo wu 


# vowels
a e i o u w y â ê î ô û ŵ ŷ ï á é ẃ à ẁ
